body: The save file will be used to ensure that #1046 is compatible with older save files. The output of the save generator was: ``` Connected to the tox network. Wrote tox save to save.tox INFORMATION ---------------------------------- Tox ID: B70E97D41F69B7F4C42A5BC7BD7A76B95B8030BE1B7C0E9E6FC19FC4ABEB195B4C762C7D800B. Nospam: 4C762C7D. Name: name. Status message: Hello World. Number of friends: 1. ---------------------------------- ``` The added friend was toxirc: A922A51E1C91205B9F7992E2273107D47C72E8AE909C61C28A77A4A2A115431B14592AB38A3B. --- This change isâ€‚[](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/1051)

comment_data.body: I wonder if we could make this tool a little more versatile, maybe have some way of generating a savefile with multiple friends, groups, etc. I'm happy to have this version submitted as an initial version, but I think the interesting bits of save parsing happen when you have more than 1 of a thing.
Why are these macros and the constants below are variables?
Prefer callbacks. This main function is quite long. Given that we'll want to extend it in the future, it's probably good to split it into a few functions.
Friend number in case of failure is unspecified. This is relying on knowledge of internals. Prefer error enums.
Not enough space for the null terminator.

comment_regular_data.body:
I think such things should go into `other/fun` directory, not just `other`.

@iphydf Btw, [I have written a bit different save file generator](https://github.com/TokTok/c-toxcore/issues/936#issuecomment-400910606) several weeks ago, do you think it makes sense to add it to the repo too? It doesn't use toxcore at all though, it crafts the save file using the current save file binary format, much like [`other/fun/make-funny-savefile.py`](https://github.com/TokTok/c-toxcore/blob/master/other/fun/make-funny-savefile.py) does.
@nurupo yes, and it seems like a good idea to put these things into other/fun.
After fixing the last style issues, rebase on master and I'll merge it.

commit.message: Add save file generator, save compatibility test, and generate a save file
